column4: Latest;Oddar Meanchey: A quantity of landmines and rockets were found by farmers  plowing their rice fields in Beng Commune on Saturday
column8: the local police chief arrived at the scene.------The B40 rockets and------ 72A anti-tank mines------ (which are difficult to detect by conventional methods
column9: due to being made of plastic) were designated as remnants of war.------Authorities reported to the Cambodian Self Help Demining Organization
column10: and the explosives will be destroyed safely.
